p: The threat of extinction makes the presence of refugia meaningful. As the sole area of distribution expansion from the LIG to the LGM, the Sichuan Basin acted as an important refuge for P. amabilis, in addition to scattered refugia in southeast China ( Fig. 3A). Fossil records of glacial periods have been used to confirm glacial refugia of organisms, though regrettably, no fossils of P. amabilis have been found in the above refugia.
